father{child: A, father: B}
father{child: B, father: C}
----
application/json
{
  "leftVars": {
    "A": [
      "child"
    ],
    "B": [
      "father"
    ]
  },
  "rightVars": {
    "B": [
      "child"
    ],
    "C": [
      "father"
    ]
  },
  "join": {
    "B": {
      "varName": "B",
      "leftAttr": [
        "father"
      ],
      "rightAttr": [
        "child"
      ]
    }
  }
}
